Forgot..:) REQ: XP-Simulation Montpellier 2005

XP-Simulation has stopped making FS scenery and removed all products from the market, so it's not obtainable anymore, which is shame because it's great french photoreal scenery, nicely made airports. I have Chambery, which fit's fine with the alpes south scenery from FranceVFR.  
But I'm looking for Montpellier 2005, which is also a stunner. 
Any takers?
